mapper.select: select di.tag_id, t.name , di.hist_type_code, di.alarm_state, di.alarm_code, di.scan_value , di.scan_time, di.prev_value, di.prev_scan_time, di.last_hist_value , di.last_hist_time, coalesce(x.float_value,0) sim_value , x.updated from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id join raw_data x on t.id = x.id where t.active = 'Y' order by 2

select di.tag_id, t.name , di.hist_type_code, di.alarm_state, di.alarm_code, di.scan_value , di.scan_time, di.prev_value, di.prev_scan_time, di.last_hist_value , di.last_hist_time, coalesce(x.float_value,0) sim_value , x.updated, x.scan_time from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id join raw_data x on t.id = x.id where t.active = 'Y' and x.updated = 1 order by 2

select di.tag_id, t.name, t.description, t.c1_lat, t.c1_long , t.c2_lat, t.c2_long, t.tag_type_code, t.active , di.hist_type_code, di.alarm_state, di.alarm_code, di.scan_value , di.scan_time, di.prev_value, di.prev_scan_time, di.last_hist_value , di.last_hist_time, di.value_view from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id order by 2
select t.id, t.name, t.description, t.tag_type_code, ai.type_code tag_type_info, t.active from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id

select di.tag_id, t.name, t.description, t.c1_lat, t.c1_long , t.c2_lat, t.c2_long, t.tag_type_code, t.active , di.hist_type_code, di.scan_value, di.scan_time, di.prev_value , di.prev_scan_time, di.last_hist_value, di.last_hist_time , di.value_view, di.alarm_state, di.alarm_code from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id where di.tag_id = #{param1}
select id, category, name, code, value, description, active from history_type_vw order by code

select rtt.id, tp.id, tc.id, tc.name, di.scan_value value, vv.name value_text , di.scan_time, coalesce(alm.code,'NORM') code, ac.item_value color from rel_tag_tag rtt join tag tp on rtt.parent_tag_id = tp.id join tag tc on rtt.child_tag_id = tc.id join digital_input di on di.tag_id = tc.id join off_on_vw vv on coalesce(di.scan_value,0) = value left outer join alarm_info alm on di.tag_id = alm.tag_id left outer join alarm_color_list_vw ac on coalesce(alm.code,'NORM') = ac.item_name where tp.name = #{param1} order by name

select di.tag_id, t.name , di.hist_type_code, di.alarm_state, di.alarm_code, di.scan_value , di.scan_time, di.prev_value, di.prev_scan_time, di.last_hist_value , di.last_hist_time, coalesce(x.float_value,0) sim_value , x.updated from digital_input di join tag t on di.tag_id = t.id join raw_data x on t.id = x.id where t.active = 'Y' and t.name like #{param1} order by 2
